name: New Moves
description:
New Moves, is a simple platform classic fighter, in which you the player and every other fighter are give a random moves every round and have to gage what your abilities can do in the moment rather than planning out responses like in tradition fighting games.

Controls : 

player1 A/D to move left and right, W to jump, Space to attack
player2 Left/Right to move left and right, Up to jump, Slash to attack
player3 J/L to move left and right, I to jump,  to attack
player4 V/N to move left and right, G to jump, M to attack
or
you can use four controllers instead.

Note:

there would be some challenges present, I just didn't have time to develop the UI for it. This was made for the Juice Jam 2022, making a game design around impact and the response you get from your actions, and to tie into the other optional theme : don't stop, the player must constantly be attacking an opposer or else there health will slowly drain, so the point is to not stop fighting.
